name: Talking Cat Emma Ballerina
summary:
My virtual pet Emma the cat has reached a new stage in her life: ballet dance school for talking pets. This talking kitty cat will show off her new ballerina dance skills in Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game. Teach my talking cat Emma virtual pet bring style and grace into the world of talking pets. Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina is a talking cat app that enriches all those dance games and ballerina games out there.

Can you multitask and make your talking cat ballerina glow from head to toe by making sure she is well fed, examined and rested? Emma the Ballerina, my talking cat, needs you every step of the way, so download Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game and help your talking cat pave the way to success! Virtual cat talking games will from now on take your breath away while my talking cat Emma parades her dance steps and ballet moves in her prima ballerina costume.
